text: yadi tum bhala karoge, to apane lie aur yadi bura karoge, to apane lie. phir jab doosare upadrav ka samay aaya taaki (shatru) tumhaare chehare bigaad den aur masjid (aqsa) mein vaise hee pravesh kar jaayen, jaise pratham baar pravesh kar gaye aur taaki jo bhee unake haath aaye, use poornata naash[1] kar de
